sentences.en: A negotiated settlement might yet be possible.
sentences.cn: 也许仍有可能通过磋商达成协议。

sentences.en: A peaceable settlement has been reached.
sentences.cn: 已经实现和解。

sentences.en: A political settlement remains tantalisingly out of reach.
sentences.cn: 政治解决方案依然可望而不可即。

sentences.en: An amicable settlement was reached.
sentences.cn: 已达成和解。

sentences.en: an early Iron Age settlement
sentences.cn: 一座铁器时代早期的村落

sentences.en: His lawyers are understood to be negotiating a settlement .
sentences.cn: 据说他的律师正在商谈一个协议。

sentences.en: His lawyers are understood to be negotiating a settlement.
sentences.cn: 据说他的律师正在商谈一个协议。

sentences.en: Hopes grew that a workable peace settlement might emerge.
sentences.cn: 达成一项可行的和平协定的希望越来越大。

sentences.en: In court filings, they argued that the settlement was inadequate.
sentences.cn: 在法庭讼案中，他们提出和解费数额太少。

sentences.en: Officials have now been delegated to start work on a draft settlement.
sentences.cn: 现在已经委派官员着手起草解决方案。

sentences.en: She accepted an out-of-court settlement of £4,000.
sentences.cn: 她同意支付4,000英镑的庭外和解赔偿金。

sentences.en: She claims he ratted on their divorce settlement.
sentences.cn: 她声称他违反了他们的离婚协议。

sentences.en: She got her home as part of the divorce settlement .
sentences.cn: 根据离婚协议，她拿到了房子。

sentences.en: She got her home as part of the divorce settlement.
sentences.cn: 根据离婚协议，她拿到了房子。

sentences.en: The company paid out over $10 million in an out-of-court settlement .
sentences.cn: 这家公司花了1,000多万美元进行庭外和解。

sentences.en: The company paid out over $10 million in an out-of-court settlement.
sentences.cn: 这家公司花了1,000多万美元进行庭外和解。

sentences.en: The media played up the prospects for a settlement.
sentences.cn: 媒体夸大了达成和解的可能性。

sentences.en: The railway stations created new settlements.
sentences.cn: 这些火车站催生了新的定居点。

sentences.en: the search for a peaceful settlement of the Northern Ireland conflict
sentences.cn: 寻找和平解决北爱尔兰冲突的办法

sentences.en: the settlement of the American West
sentences.cn: 美国西部的开拓过程

sentences.en: The village is a settlement of just fifty houses.
sentences.cn: 这个村子里只住了50户人。

sentences.en: There are much brighter prospects for a comprehensive settlement than before.
sentences.cn: 综合性的社区具有比以前更加光明的前景。

sentences.en: They are not optimistic about a settlement of the eleven year conflict.
sentences.cn: 他们不是很有信心能和平解决这场长达11年的纷争。

sentences.en: They continue their groping towards a constitutional settlement.
sentences.cn: 他们继续寻求合乎宪法规定的解决方案。

sentences.en: They have tried to reconstruct the settlement as it would have been in Iron Age times.
sentences.cn: 他们已试着按铁器时代的样子重建这个小村落。

sentences.en: They were coerced into negotiating a settlement.
sentences.cn: 他们被迫通过谈判解决。

sentences.en: Union leaders and company bosses will meet tomorrow in an attempt to reach a settlement .
sentences.cn: 工会领导人和公司老板将于明天举行会议以期达成协议。

sentences.en: Union leaders and company bosses will meet tomorrow in an attempt to reach a settlement.
sentences.cn: 工会领导人和公司老板将于明天举行会议以期达成协议。

words.tran_cn: 结论,决定,合同,协作,整顿

phrases.tran_cn: 固结沉降；地基应力和变形固结沉降
n. 不均匀沉降；[化]沉降差
争端解决机构；争端处理机构；争端解决机制
最终沉降；[法]最后的授与财产清算；最终结算
地基沉降；基础沉降；地基沉陷

trans.tran_cn: 解决，结算，<律>金钱或财产的转让（契约），沉淀，定居点
trans.tran_en: an official agreement or decision that ends an argument, a court case, or a fight, or the action of making an agreement
